name: JaiRuta
description: iOS app for transport workers to plan and optimize multi-stop routes. Published on the App Store, it improves delivery efficiency with real-time route optimization and messaging.

features.name: Route Optimization
features.description: Optimizes your routes considering your schedule, delivery windows, and traffic conditions for maximum efficiency.

features.name: Multi-Stop Planning
features.description: Easily plan multiple stops in a single route to reduce travel time and improve delivery workflow.

features.name: Stops Autocomplete
features.description: Uses Live Activities and real-time location updates so you can complete stops without opening the app.

name: PocketAccountant
description: Personal Finance Management App built with SwiftUI, Swift-Data, and CloudKit for cross-device synchronization. Provides widgets, Siri shortcuts, and a seamless user experience.

features.name: Widgets
features.description: View key financial information directly on your home screen.

features.name: Siri Integration
features.description: Use Siri to quickly add transactions or check balances.

features.name: Shortcuts
features.description: Automate common tasks like expense logging or report generation.

features.name: Cross-Device Sync
features.description: Seamless data synchronization across all your Apple devices using CloudKit.
